verses.verse: Moreover <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3254>continued<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
As <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who has <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> and the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> who has <S%H4843>vexed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5750>while<s%> my <S%H5397>breath<s%> is in me, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> is in my <S%H639>nostrils;<s%>
My <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall not <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5766>wickedness,<s%> <S%H518>nor<s%> my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1897>utter<s%> <S%H7423>deceit.<s%>
God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that I should <S%H6663>justify<s%> you: <S%H5704>till<s%> I <S%H1478>die<s%> I will not <S%H5493>remove<s%> my <S%H8538>integrity<s%> from me.

My <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> I <S%H2388>hold<s%> fast, and will not let it <S%H7503>go:<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall not <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me <S%H3605>so<s%> <S%H3117>long<s%> as I <S%H3117>live.<s%>
Let my <S%H341>enemy<s%> be as the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and he that <S%H6965>rises<s%> up against me as the <S%H5767>unrighteous.<s%>

For <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of the <S%H2611>hypocrite,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> he has <S%H1214>gained,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H7953>takes<s%> <S%H7953>away<s%> his <S%H5315>soul?<s%>
Will <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H6818>cry<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H6869>trouble<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> on him?
Will he <S%H6026>delight<s%> himself in the <S%H7706>Almighty?<s%> will he <S%H6256>always<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> on <S%H433>God?<s%>
I will <S%H3384>teach<s%> you by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H410>God:<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> is with the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> will I not <S%H3582>conceal.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you yourselves have <S%H2372>seen<s%> it; <S%H4100>why<s%> then are you <S%H2088>thus<s%> altogether <S%H1891>vain?<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> with <S%H410>God,<s%> and the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of <S%H6184>oppressors,<s%> which they shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> be <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> it is for the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> and his <S%H6631>offspring<s%> shall not be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
Those that <S%H8300>remain<s%> of him shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H4194>death:<s%> and his <S%H490>widows<s%> shall not <S%H1058>weep.<s%>
<S%H518>Though<s%> he <S%H6651>heap<s%> up <S%H3701>silver<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> <S%H4403>raiment<s%> as the <S%H2563>clay;<s%>
He may <S%H3559>prepare<s%> it, but the <S%H6662>just<s%> shall <S%H3847>put<s%> it on, and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
He <S%H1129>builds<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> as a <S%H6211>moth,<s%> and as a <S%H5521>booth<s%> that the <S%H5341>keeper<s%> <S%H6213>makes.<s%>
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> man shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> but he shall not be <S%H622>gathered:<s%> he <S%H6491>opens<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and he is not.
<S%H1091>Terrors<s%> <S%H5381>take<s%> <S%H5381>hold<s%> on him as <S%H4325>waters,<s%> a <S%H5492>tempest<s%> <S%H1589>steals<s%> him away in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
The <S%H6921>east<s%> wind <S%H5375>carries<s%> him away, and he <S%H3212>departs:<s%> and as a storm <S%H8175>hurles<s%> him out of his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
For <S%H410>God<s%> shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> on him, and not <S%H2550>spare:<s%> he would <S%H1272>fain<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
Men shall <S%H5606>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> him, and shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%> him out of his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
